about_the_game:
ILL NESS is a first-person atmospheric horror action game with horrifying alien creatures that inhabit inside people while turning them into puppets. The player will have what is missing in many games of a similar genre; in ILL NESS, you will not have to hide in dark corners, trying to escape invincible monsters. The player will have everything needed to make even the scariest and most horrifying opponent tremble. You will have to dive into a cruel world where there is no single living soul left and unveil the terrible mystery of Adam Bedford by fighting a truly terrifying alien evil.



CHARACTERISTIC FEATURES

*

First-person. The player assumes the role of Adam Bedford. They will witness a desperate struggle and a horrifying chase through the eyes of the main character.


*

The whole planet is full of ruthless creatures that are hunting for every single living soul. With every step, Adam is faced with danger, while trying to find any sign of life.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
